newsitem.title: USA: Open Market to support Cybercash.
newsitem.headline: Open Market to support Cybercash.

text.p: Open Market Inc on Tuesday said it would add support in its Internet commerce software, for CyberCash, a Reston, Virginia-based software developer.
Open Market's OM-Transact software will provide online businesses and their customers with additional secure Internet payment options, Open Market said.

"Open Market's Internet commerce offering demonstrates a commitment to giving its customers as many payment options as possible," said Dennis Yaro, executive vice president, products and operations, CyberCash.
"By providing consumers and the business community with a full range of secure payment methods, Open Market is facilitating the arrival of a mature electronic commerce market, he added."
